Procedure.description:
PROCEDURE PURPOSE: Update OOP Parameters by loading PAF and launching N_AOC_0130
PROCEDURE VERSION: 20 RESPONSIBILITY: AOCS team LAST MODIFIED DATE: 2023-01-13
CHANGE HISTORY: [CBi 2023/01/13, EUM v20.0] Changes for AR6491: Step P.6 corrected argument association for EPHM_COEF_Z_4_2 and EPHM_COEF_Z_4_3
Perform the daily planned update of the OOP parameters for the following 24 hours.
PRECONDITION : The AOCS mode shall be GAM or FPM or SKM The OOP shall be ON
CONFIRMATION : Domain Var flag OOP_Update_OK updated to true.
Procedure.title: Update OOP Parameters
Procedure.author: bihr_OPRE
Procedure.hierarchy: Child Procedures: Default:NomAOCSsys::N_AOC_0130 called by steps: P.6
Procedure.history:
[CBi 2023/01/13, EUM v20.0] Changes for AR6491: Step P.6 corrected argument association for EPHM_COEF_Z_4_2 and EPHM_COEF_Z_4_3
[RTi 2022/10/19, EUM v19.0]
- added step P.2 and P.3 to correct the arguments EPHM_ADD_DV and SLEW_ENABLED with the one used in the FDS PAF EPHM_ADD_DV SLEW_ENABLED_i, as per EUM/MTG/AR/5968.1. the steps have been copied form N SAT I 150
[RTi 2022/04/06, EUM v18.0]
- adde Simoffset parameter type time to add an offset to the FDS input data for simulation - added step P.3 to consider the above declared Offset.
[CBi 2021/12/16, EUM v16.0] based on latest FOM05 (delivered 2021-10-22, EUM v.14.0) procedure, which has no changes wrt. previous industry delivered version FOM4.4 (EUM v.6.0) Version 1: Date 16.01.2020 - FOM04
******** Version 1: Date 16.01.2020 - FOM04 - Verified with SRDB version MTG_I_PFM_05_01;
CBi 2021/04/21: LOAD PAF step 2 implemented to load the FDS PAF, added Argument PAF_OOP
CBi 2021/06/24: removed old 3 string arguments for X,Y,Z and added the 45 arguments for the X,Y,Z coefficients in procedure argument list and also in step P.3 + referencing them
[CBi 2021/06/25] added 0.0 for initial values
[CBi 2021/08/13] Updated to call new PAF file FDS_OPE_PAF_OOP_MTI1_20220629120803_2022063003.xml to have it in line with SATSIM BKP simulating 2022-181..
[CBi 2021/09/24] Default argument for Ref date set for safety to 2001-196T00:00:00.000Z
[CBi 2021/10/21, v.12.0] updates for OSV testing: In procedure arguments PAF_OOP set the name from the specific FDS_OPE_PAF_OOP_MTI1_20220629120803_2022063003.xml to generic and non available FDS_OPE_PAF_OOP_MTI1_NULL.xml , in order to allow a manually selection of the PAF
[CBi 2021/11/11, v.13.0] Argument 'Activity' added for MPS, set by default to 'UPDATE' values can be 'INITIALISE', 'OFF', 'ACTIVE', 'IDLE', 'UPDATE', 'UPDATE_TCs_ONLY', 'OPERATIONAL'
[CBi 2021/11/26, v.15.0] based on previous EUM v.13.0 and checked with latest FOM05 (delivered 2021-10-22, EUM v.14.0) procedure, which has no changes wrt. previous industry delivered version FOM4.4 (EUM v.6.0)
[CBi 2021/12/16, EUM v16.0] - minor edits for procedure details to align with EUM MTGPPR

ProcedureArgument.name: Activity
ProcedureArgument.description: 'INITIALISE', 'OFF', 'ACTIVE', 'IDLE', 'UPDATE', 'UPDATE_TCs_ONLY', 'OPERATIONAL'

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_ADD_DV
ProcedureArgument.description: Defines whether the cumulated velocity variations provided by the thrust system are used to update the orbit

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_COEF_X_1_1
ProcedureArgument.description: Orbit-perturbation coefficients along x

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_COEF_Y_1_1
ProcedureArgument.description: Orbit-perturbation coefficients along y

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_COEF_Z_1_1
ProcedureArgument.description: Orbit-perturbation coefficients along z

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_COS_HALF_L
ProcedureArgument.description: Cosine of the half of the sum of the sidereal angle and the nominal longitude of the SC, given at the time OOP_DAT_ephm_refDate

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_END_DATE
ProcedureArgument.description: Time after which the orbit may not be used any longer

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_QJ2_TOD_1
ProcedureArgument.description: Quaternion giving the rotation from the frame J2000 to the True-of-Date frame (precession and nutation of the Earth rotation axis)

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_QJ2_TOD_2
ProcedureArgument.description: Quaternion giving the rotation from the frame J2000 to the True-of-Date frame (precession and nutation of the Earth rotation axis)

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_QJ2_TOD_3
ProcedureArgument.description: Quaternion giving the rotation from the frame J2000 to the True-of-Date frame (precession and nutation of the Earth rotation axis)

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_QJ2_TOD_4
ProcedureArgument.description: Quaternion giving the rotation from the frame J2000 to the True-of-Date frame (precession and nutation of the Earth rotation axis)

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_REF_DATE
ProcedureArgument.description: Time at which the perturbation phase is zero for the orbit perturbation in R_LOFT

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_SIN_HALF_L
ProcedureArgument.description: Sine of the half of the sum of the sidereal angle and the nominal longitude of the SC, given at the time OOP_DAT_ephm_refDate

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_START_DATE
ProcedureArgument.description: Time after which the orbit may be used

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_TARGET_X
ProcedureArgument.description: Position along x of the target point on the Earth in R_LOFT (from the ideal GEO orbit)

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_TARGET_Y
ProcedureArgument.description: Position along y of the target point on the Earth in R_LOFT (from the ideal GEO orbit)

ProcedureArgument.name: EPHM_TARGET_Z
ProcedureArgument.description: Position along z of the target point on the Earth in R_LOFT (from the ideal GEO orbit)

ProcedureArgument.name: OBERTime
ProcedureArgument.description: On Board Execution Reference Time

ProcedureArgument.name: OOP_ExeTime
ProcedureArgument.description: Execution time of the activity ACTIVE or UPDATE

ProcedureArgument.name: SLEW_ENABLED
ProcedureArgument.description: Defines whether quaternion slew signals are generated

ProcedureArgument.name: SLEW_MAX_JMP_Q
ProcedureArgument.description: Slew maximum initial jump (the cosine of the half angle)

ProcedureArgument.name: SLEW_MAX_JMP_W
ProcedureArgument.description: Slew maximum initial rate

ProcedureArgument.name: SLEW_MAX_W
ProcedureArgument.description: Slew maximum rate

ProcedureArgument.name: SLEW_MAX_W_DOT
ProcedureArgument.description: Slew maximum acceleration. It should re-main at least 20 times smaller than OOP_DAT_slew_maxW

argument.name: OOP_ExeTime
argument.description: Execution time of the activity ACTIVE or UPDATE

argument.name: EPHM_QJ2_TOD_4
argument.description: Quaternion giving the rotation from the frame J2000 to the True-of-Date frame (precession and nutation of the Earth rotation axis)

argument.name: EPHM_SIN_HALF_L
argument.description: Sine of the half of the sum of the sidereal angle and the nominal longitude of the SC, given at the time OOP_DAT_ephm_refDate

argument.name: EPHM_COS_HALF_L
argument.description: Cosine of the half of the sum of the sidereal angle and the nominal longitude of the SC, given at the time OOP_DAT_ephm_refDate

argument.name: EPHM_TARGET_Y
argument.description: Position along y of the target point on the Earth in R_LOFT (from the ideal GEO orbit)

argument.name: EPHM_TARGET_X
argument.description: Position along x of the target point on the Earth in R_LOFT (from the ideal GEO orbit)

argument.name: SLEW_MAX_JMP_W
argument.description: Slew maximum initial rate

argument.name: SLEW_MAX_JMP_Q
argument.description: Slew maximum initial jump (the cosine of the half angle)

argument.name: EPHM_QJ2_TOD_3
argument.description: Quaternion giving the rotation from the frame J2000 to the True-of-Date frame (precession and nutation of the Earth rotation axis)

argument.name: EPHM_QJ2_TOD_1
argument.description: Quaternion giving the rotation from the frame J2000 to the True-of-Date frame (precession and nutation of the Earth rotation axis)

argument.name: SLEW_MAX_W_DOT
argument.description: Slew maximum acceleration. It should re-main at least 20 times smaller than OOP_DAT_slew_maxW

argument.name: OBERTime
argument.description: On Board Execution Reference Time

argument.name: EPHM_QJ2_TOD_2
argument.description: Quaternion giving the rotation from the frame J2000 to the True-of-Date frame (precession and nutation of the Earth rotation axis)

argument.name: EPHM_START_DATE
argument.description: Time after which the orbit may be used

argument.name: EPHM_REF_DATE
argument.description: Time at which the perturbation phase is zero for the orbit perturbation in R_LOFT

argument.name: EPHM_END_DATE
argument.description: Time after which the orbit may not be used any longer

argument.name: EPHM_TARGET_Z
argument.description: Position along z of the target point on the Earth in R_LOFT (from the ideal GEO orbit)

argument.name: SLEW_MAX_W
argument.description: Slew maximum rate

argument.name: SLEW_ENABLED
argument.description: Defines whether quaternion slew signals are generated

argument.name: EPHM_ADD_DV
argument.description: Defines whether the cumulated velocity variations provided by the thrust system are used to update the orbit

argument.name: Activity
argument.description: 'INITIALISE', 'OFF', 'ACTIVE', 'IDLE', 'UPDATE', 'UPDATE_TCs_ONLY', 'OPERATIONAL'
